pages.name: Owl
pages.text: Entities must be inside the central $(item)Cobweb$().

pages.title: Mutation Details
pages.text: Entities:$(br)$(8)>$() 1 Wolf$(br)$(p)Notes:$(br)One $(l:herbology/herbology#grassper)Grassper$(/l) needs to hold a $(l:)Charged Attuned Stone$(/l), and the other three $(l:)Mutandis Extremis$(/l)$(p)Snares must be $(l:herbology/herbology#critter_snare)Bat Critter Snare$(/l).
